caption: Deploy Token Drop
doc: Deploy a ERC-20 token drop contract.

AKb.caption: Name
AKb.doc: The name of this ERC-20 smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this splitter on a block explorer.
AKb.name: name

AKc.caption: Description
AKc.doc: The description of the ERC-20. This will only be visible when viewing this splitter on a block explorer.
AKc.name: description

AKd.caption: Image
AKd.doc: The image of this ERC-20. This will only be visible when viewing this ERC-20 smart contract on a block explorer. This can be the value of a image uploader or an IPFS links formatted: ipfs://<CID>
AKd.name: image

AKe.caption: Symbol
AKe.doc: The symbol of this ERC-20 smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this ERC-20 smart contract on a block explorer.
AKe.name: symbol

AKf.caption: Primary Sale Recipient
AKf.doc: The wallet address that will receive the funds when these tokens are sold.
AKf.name: primary_sale_recipient
